welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Biddeford, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches and rich history. We're excited to have you here and invite you to discover all the unique sights and experiences our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at International Jetport Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at International Jetport Airport is responsible for handling all air freight and mail shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo shipments and freight services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
